infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: We need access to your camera for KYC identity verification. This helps keep our community safe and authentic.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: We need access to your photo library to upload profile photos.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Microphone access is needed for video calls with your matches.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your camera for identity verification.
plugins.microphonePermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your microphone for video calls.
